# MultipleMatching { #matching.matchings.MultipleMatching }

`matchings.MultipleMatching(self, dictionary)`

Matching class for games with multiple matches like HR or SA.

## Parameters

| Name         | Type   | Description                                                 | Default    |
|--------------|--------|-------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `dictionary` |        | A dictionary comprised of ``Hospital, List[Player]`` pairs. | _required_ |
